biotools.summary: snHiC is a snakemake based end-to-end pipeline to analyze Hi-C data. The input files required to run the pipeline are Paired-End fastq files. The pipeline performs data quality control, normalization and correction. It also includes the possibility to perform grouped analyses (e.g, merging of replicates) besides TAD, loops and stripes detection and differential contacts and compartment analyses.
